text: ‫ؠ‬ I am very certain that I could take the necessary measures ‫ؠ‬ I am quite certain that I could take the necessary measures ‫ؠ‬ I am somewhat certain that I could take the necessary measures ‫ؠ‬ I am doubtful that I could take the necessary measures ‫ؠ‬ I am very certain that I could NOT take the necessary measures 13. Imagine there is a new worldwide influenza pandemic that has also reached the Netherlands. Your local community health services have provided you with a face mask and urged you to wear it in all public places in order to prevent infection. Would you wear the face mask in all public places?
